title: 'Game Of Thrones' Fans Develop Formula To Determine Who Might Survive Series
teaser: The fifth season of HBO's Game of Thrones premiered Sunday. The show is known for being "deadly," and fans know not to get too attached to characters. Now two students at Olin College in Massachusetts have come up with a way to predict who might die soonest.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
